publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4701 Stuart McMillan: World Pipe Band Championshipsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Simon Fraser University of Vancouver, Canada on winning the World Pipe Band Championships; notes the success of the event, held at Glasgow Green, which attracted over 40,000 spectators and bands from 16 countries, and further notes that Strathclyde Police Pipe Band were the highest-placed Scottish band, finishing an excellent fourth overall out of over 200 bands, and that its future success will be jeopardised if planned cuts to Strathclyde Police Pipe Band are implemented. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Alasdair Allan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Ian McKee*, Jamie McGrigor*, Angela Constance*, Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*
S3M-4701 World Pipe Band Championships (lodged on 17 August 2009) Nanette Milne*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-4701 World Pipe Band Championships (lodged on 17 August 2009) Aileen Campbell*
